data.title: Brazilian Foods
data.meta_description: Find some of your favorite Brazilian food items right at your local Milam's in Miami! Like Forno De Minas and Catupiry Requeijao!
data.text:
Forno De Minas, Pao De Queijo

Commonly known as Brazilian cheese bread, this popular treat is a favorite for so many of us. Warm and packed with a surprising amount of flavor for the simplicity of its ingredients, this is one food that works well as a snack or as a side dish for a bigger meal.

Catupiry Requeijao

Cream cheese is an ingredient that can be enjoyed as a topping or mixed into a variety of dishes—but this Brazilian cream cheese takes things even further. Enjoy it with some toasted bread, or mix it into pasta. No matter how you use it, it will bring an amazing flavor!

Lacta Bis Chocolate Wafer Biscuits

This popular Brazilian candy is a treat that can satiate a sugar craving or help you to make a new friend at work. Chocolate is combined with perfectly crisp wafers to provide a snacking experience that nothing else compares to.

Vale Douro Biscoito Polvilho

This popular and crunchy Brazilian snack is perfect for those midday cravings when you need a snack to get you through the rest of your day. Simple yet satisfying, this is a great option to have on hand whether you are heading back from the beach or finishing up a day at work.

Yoki Farofa

This popular side is the perfect partner for meals, like barbecue with black beans and rice. Offering a delicious and nutritious boost to any meal, this is a great one to keep in the home at all times. Cook it up how you like, and don’t hesitate to see what dishes it pairs well with!

Itambe Condensed Milk

If you are looking to make some of your favorite homemade Brazilian desserts, you will absolutely need this condensed milk on hand. Perfect for creating a variety of sweet treats, like brigadieros, this is a must-have in your home’s pantry.
